channel.title: [Class Suggestion]The Therapist/The Psychologist
channel.description:
> # [color=steblue]The Therapist[/color] > **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Investigative[/color]** > > **Night Ability (Confess)** - See if your target has done anything *wrong*.(Infinite Uses) > **Night Ability (All Ears)** - Target 2 players and see who's more powerful.(2 Uses) > *Goal: **[color=steblue]BD[/color]**'s goal.* > > # [color=purple]The Psychologist[/color] > **[color=purple]Unseen Investigative[/color]** > > **Day Ability (Mind of A Killer)** - See if the target is an **Killer** class.(2 Uses) > > **Night Ability (Manipulate)** - Decide who your target targets tonight. Their visits will be hidden. They will still be able to perform their night action and your night action at the same time.(Infinite Uses - Only works on **Killer** classes - Only killing abilities will be used.) > **Night Ability (Eavesdrop)** - See what your target did the night before.(2 Uses) > *Goal: **[color=purple]Unseen[/color]**'s goal.*
> # Wrong Doings > + Your target was prevented from visiting their target. > + Your target attacked someone of the same faction. > + Your target redirected someone.
> # Powerful Meter > Special > Investigative > Investigative > Support > Support > Social > Social > Killer > Killer > Offensive > Offensive > Special
To be honest , I made this class so Marcus would come bacc. "Feedback is welcome"

Your target attacked someone of the same faction.

This will never happen unless alch bombs a merc or something or assassin gets redirected. just say plain “target attacked this night”

item.title: [Class Suggestion]The Therapist/The Psychologist
item.dc:creator: NAOtheRitualist
item.description:
The Therapist

Blue Dragon Investigative

Night Ability (Confess) - See if your target has done anything wrong.(Infinite Uses)
Night Ability (All Ears) - Target 2 players and see who’s more powerful.(2 Uses)
Goal: BD’s goal.

The Psychologist

Unseen Investigative

Day Ability (Mind of A Killer) - See if the target is an Killer class.(2 Uses)

Night Ability (Manipulate) - Decide who your target targets tonight. Their visits will be hidden. They will still be able to perform their night action and your night action at the same time.(Infinite Uses - Only works on Killer classes - Only killing abilities will be used.)
Night Ability (Eavesdrop) - See what your target did the night before.(2 Uses)
Goal: Unseen’s goal.

Wrong Doings

  • Your target was prevented from visiting their target.
  • Your target attacked someone of the same faction.
  • Your target redirected someone.

Powerful Meter

Special > Investigative
Investigative > Support
Support > Social
Social > Killer
Killer > Offensive
Offensive > Special

To be honest , I made this class so Marcus would come bacc.
“Feedback is welcome”

Read full topic
